Articles.Content:
hello, im new here, and ive been playing ksp for about 50 hours with graphics mods, and i seem to get alot of lag for no apparent reason.
i use a NVIDIA RTX 3060 laptop GPU and it is somehow using 99% of it, causing the physics simulation to slow down, however, the odd part is my laptop is barely heating up and i dont even need to use my cooling fan

can somebody please help with this? i know it is using my dedicated GPU and my graphics mods are Parallax, SVE textures, EVE scatterer, and maybe another. i read about the RTX 3060 and it should be way more than enough to run ksp, and my usage readings are from NVIDIA experience and task manager and they show the same results.

i would really like to be able to play KSP without 8 FPS so i can fly planes or explore planets.

additionaly, ive been able to play Elite: Dangerous on high graphics and no FPS drop. its a bit hot, but its fine.

if somebody can find a solution to this, it would be greatly appreciated!
Do you have your game graphics at max? If you do, turning down both reflection sliders to the second highest will massively increase performance with no visual loss. Hope this helps.

Replying to @Benzo Kerman

i found that out a bit before you answered! i turned reflections off and GPU usage reduced 60%

now i can play without lag!

56 minutes ago, Pandor1on said:

now i can play without lag!

Great! Glad I could help!
